item.title: How much is an emoji worth
item.description: I have written a bit about how to make your commit messages more insightful.

item.description: A collection of Powershell snippets I have found useful. Set the title of the window: (Get-Host).

item.title: Tips for using Trello
item.description: The team I work in uses Trello to visualise our work.

item.title: Cumulative flow diagrams
item.description: What is a CFD? A CFD is a graph showing the state of the work over a period of time based on data acquired from Kanban.

item.title: How do we work
item.description: This is a little bit about how work at where I work works.
